Headline: #75 74th-75thTemporary Westbound Reroute near 75th/South Shore
ShortDescription: Westbound 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony Island, 76th, South Chicago and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony Island, 76th, South Chicago and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Shore.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Northbound Reroute near 75th/South Shore

Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at 26th/Albany
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temp. rerouted in both directions via Blue Island, Western, Cermak, Cicero, and 24th, due to street blockage near 26th/Albany.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Blue Island, Western, Cermak, Cicero, and 24th, into terminal, due to street blockage near 26th/Albany.

Allow extra travel time.
